attributes.action: Stop the PM from carrying out the 'gravest abuse of power in living memory'
attributes.additional_details:
Here's polling that shows that leaving without a deal is a minority held wish: https://whatukthinks.org/eu/questions/if-there-was-a-referendum-tomorrow-with-the-option-of-accepting-the-governments-brexit-agreement-or-leaving-the-eu-without-a-deal-which-would-you-support-2-3/

Claims that no deal was discussed during the referendum are hard to find: https://www.channel4.com/news/factcheck/factcheck-we-cant-find-evidence-that-dominic-raab-warned-of-no-deal-brexit
attributes.background: Mr Johnson has repeatedly refused to rule out prorogation if MPs try to stop him taking the UK out of the EU without a deal. It now looks like he will ask the Queen to suspend parliament to try and force through a no deal Brexit which only a small minority of the country supports.
